## 🌍 Essential Background and Foundational Resources

### 📘 Books and Key Overviews
- **Handbook of Geospatial Artificial Intelligence** (Gao, Hu, Li, 2023) – Comprehensive reference with 30+ topics, code examples, datasets.
- **Deep Learning for the Earth Sciences** (Camps-Valls, Tuia, Zhu, 2021) – Earth data meets deep learning; ideal for understanding EO models.
- **GeoAI and Human Geography** (Xiao Huang, 2025) – Connects GeoAI with environmental and human systems.

### 📄 Review Articles
- **Boutayeb et al., 2024** – A comprehensive survey of GeoAI methods and applications.

---

## Week-by-Week Resources

### Week 1: Introduction to Geospatial Foundation Models
- 🌐 **Development Seed Blog (2024)**: [Using Foundation Models for Earth Observation](https://developmentseed.org/blog/2024/11/15/geoai-foundation-models/)
- 🚀 **NASA/IBM Release**: [Prithvi HLS Foundation Model](https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/news/geoai-foundation-model)
- ☁️ **AWS ML Blog (2025)**: [Deploying GeoFMs on AWS](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/machine-learning/revolutionizing-earth-observation-with-foundation-models/)

### Week 2: Working with Geospatial Data
- 📚 **Book**: *Learning Geospatial Analysis with Python (4th ed., 2023)*
- 🧰 **TorchGeo Docs**: [https://pytorch.org/geo](https://pytorch.org/geo)
- 🌍 **OpenGeoAI Toolkit**: [https://github.com/opengeos/geoai](https://github.com/opengeos/geoai)

### Week 3: Loading & Using Foundation Models
- 🤗 **Hugging Face Prithvi Models**: [https://huggingface.co/ibm-nasa-geospatial](https://huggingface.co/ibm-nasa-geospatial)
- 📓 **Demo Notebooks**: Available on Hugging Face model cards.
- 🧪 **AWS GeoFM Deployment Examples**: Code and pipelines via GitHub.
- 🧠 **IEEE GRSS Blog**: [Self-Supervised Geospatial Backbones](https://grss-ieee.org/blog/2023/04/self-supervised-backbones/)

### Week 4: Multi-modal & Generative Models
- 🛰️ **Sensor Fusion via TorchGeo**: Stack Sentinel-1/2 & others.
- 🌐 **Presto, Clay, DOFA Models**: Explained in DevSeed & AWS blogs.
- 🧪 **DiffusionSat Example**: [Medium Tutorial on Generating EO Images](https://medium.com/@karray/diffusion-models-for-remote-sensing-part-5-abc123)

### Week 5: Model Adaptation & Evaluation
- 🔌 **Adapters for GeoFM**: Explained via Development Seed blog.
- 📊 **Evaluation Metrics**: IoU, mAP, F1 from Boutayeb et al. (2024) + SpaceNet.
- 📁 **Radiant Earth MLHub**: [https://mlhub.earth](https://mlhub.earth) – Public geospatial ML datasets and benchmarks.

## Interactive Sessions

### 1️⃣ PyTorch & TorchGeo Fundamentals
- TorchGeo docs & sample loaders (CRS, tile sampling, multispectral).

### 2️⃣ Loading & Using Foundation Models
- Hugging Face GeoFM models (Prithvi, Clay) and notebook demos.

### 3️⃣ Multi-modal & Sensor Fusion
- DOFA & Clay examples; stacking Sentinel data with TorchGeo.

### 4️⃣ Model Adaptation & Evaluation
- Fine-tuning using TerraTorch and evaluation on public datasets.

### 5️⃣ Scalable Analysis & Deployment
- 📚 *Geospatial Data Analytics on AWS* (2023)
- ☁️ AWS SageMaker + GeoFM repo (scalable inference)
